As Eater I can see all categories collapsed when open Order Page. When signe category is expanded all available dishes of the category is shown (including Everyday Dishes, which have a different background)

Acceptance criteria

  • Create mockup
  • Collect votes for best mockup
  • Create card with final mockup.
